SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN Currency = 'EUR' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / SUM(CASE WHEN Currency = 'CZK' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM customers;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
1: SELECT T1.CustomerID FROM yearmonth AS T1 INNER JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID WHERE T2.Segment = 'LAM' AND T1.Date LIKE '2012%' GROUP BY T1.CustomerID ORDER BY sum(T1.Consumption) ASC LIMIT 1	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
2:
SELECT AVG(T1.Consumption) / 12
FROM YearMonth AS T1
INNER JOIN Customers AS T2 ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID
WHERE T2.Segment = 'SME' AND T1.Date BETWEEN '201301' AND '201312';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
3:
SELECT
  (
    SELECT
      SUM(T1.Consumption)
    FROM yearmonth AS T1
    JOIN customers AS T2
      ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID
    WHERE
      T2.Currency = 'CZK' AND T1.Date BETWEEN '201201' AND '201212'
  ) - (
    SELECT
      SUM(T1.Consumption)
    FROM yearmonth AS T1
    JOIN customers AS T2
      ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID
    WHERE
      T2.Currency = 'EUR' AND T1.Date BETWEEN '201201' AND '201212'
  );	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
4: SELECT STRFTIME('%Y', Date) AS Year FROM YearMonth WHERE CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM Customers WHERE Currency = 'CZK') GROUP BY Year ORDER BY SUM(Consumption) DESC LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
5:
SELECT
  SUBSTR(Date, 5, 2)
FROM YearMonth
WHERE
  CustomerID IN (
    SELECT
      CustomerID
    FROM Customers
    WHERE
      Segment = 'SME'
  )
  AND SUBSTR(Date, 1, 4) = '2013'
GROUP BY
  SUBSTR(Date, 5, 2)
ORDER BY
  SUM(Consumption) DESC
LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
6:
SELECT
  (
    SELECT
      AVG(T1.Consumption)
    FROM YearMonth AS T1
    INNER JOIN Customers AS T2
      ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID
    WHERE
      SUBSTR(T1.Date, 1, 4) = '2013'
      AND T2.Currency = 'CZK'
    GROUP BY
      T2.Segment
    HAVING
      T2.Segment = 'SME'
  ) - (
    SELECT
      AVG(T1.Consumption)
    FROM YearMonth AS T1
    INNER JOIN Customers AS T2
      ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID
    WHERE
      SUBSTR(T1.Date, 1, 4) = '2013'
      AND T2.Currency = 'CZK'
    GROUP BY
      T2.Segment
    HAVING
      T2.Segment = 'LAM'
  ) AS SME_LAM_Difference,
  (
    SELECT
      AVG(T1.Consumption)
    FROM YearMonth AS T1
    INNER JOIN Customers AS T2
      ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID
    WHERE
      SUBSTR(T1.Date, 1, 4) = '2013'
      AND T2.Currency = 'CZK'
    GROUP BY
      T2.Segment
    HAVING
      T2.Segment = 'LAM'
  ) - (
    SELECT
      AVG(T1.Consumption)
    FROM YearMonth AS T1
    INNER JOIN Customers AS T2
      ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID
    WHERE
      SUBSTR(T1.Date, 1, 4) = '2013'
      AND T2.Currency = 'CZK'
    GROUP BY
      T2.Segment
    HAVING
      T2.Segment = 'KAM'
  ) AS LAM_KAM_Difference,
  (
    SELECT
      AVG(T1.Consumption)
    FROM YearMonth AS T1
    INNER JOIN Customers AS T2
      ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID
    WHERE
      SUBSTR(T1.Date, 1, 4) = '2013'
      AND T2.Currency = 'CZK'
    GROUP BY
      T2.Segment
    HAVING
      T2.Segment = 'KAM'
  ) - (
    SELECT
      AVG(T1.Consumption)
    FROM YearMonth AS T1
    INNER JOIN Customers AS T2
      ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID
    WHERE
      SUBSTR(T1.Date, 1, 4) = '2013'
      AND T2.Currency = 'CZK'
    GROUP BY
      T2.Segment
    HAVING
      T2.Segment = 'SME'
  ) AS KAM_SME_Difference;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
7:
SELECT
  Segment,
  PercentageIncrease
FROM (
  SELECT
    c.Segment,
    (
      (
        SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2013' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2012' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END)
      ) * 100.0 / SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2012' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END)
    ) AS PercentageIncrease,
    RANK() OVER (ORDER BY (
      (
        SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2013' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2012' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END)
      ) * 100.0 / SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2012' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END)
    ) DESC) AS RankAsc,
    RANK() OVER (ORDER BY (
      (
        SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2013' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2012' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END)
      ) * 100.0 / SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) = '2012' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END)
    ) ASC) AS RankDesc
  FROM yearmonth AS ym
  JOIN customers AS c
    ON ym.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
  WHERE
    c.Currency = 'EUR' AND SUBSTR(ym.Date, 1, 4) IN ('2012', '2013')
  GROUP BY
    c.Segment
)
WHERE
  RankAsc = 1 OR RankDesc = 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
8: SELECT SUM(Consumption) FROM yearmonth WHERE CustomerID = 6 AND substr(Date, 1, 6) BETWEEN '201308' AND '201311'	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
9: SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM gasstations WHERE Country = "CZE" AND Segment = "Discount") - (SELECT count(*) FROM gasstations WHERE Country = "SVK" AND Segment = "Discount");	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
10:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN (
      SELECT
        COUNT(*)
      FROM customers
      WHERE
        Segment = 'SME' AND Currency = 'CZK'
    ) > (
      SELECT
        COUNT(*)
      FROM customers
      WHERE
        Segment = 'SME' AND Currency = 'EUR'
    )
    THEN 'Yes, ' || (
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT(*)
        FROM customers
        WHERE
          Segment = 'SME' AND Currency = 'CZK'
      ) - (
        SELECT
          COUNT(*)
        FROM customers
        WHERE
          Segment = 'SME' AND Currency = 'EUR'
      )
    )
    ELSE 'No'
  END;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing

  ON t.ProductID = p.ProductID

25:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN STRFTIME('%Y', Date) = '2012' THEN Consumption ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN STRFTIME('%Y', Date) = '2013' THEN Consumption ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / SUM(CASE WHEN STRFTIME('%Y', Date) = '2012' THEN Consumption ELSE 0 END)
FROM YearMonth
WHERE
  CustomerID = (
    SELECT
      CustomerID
    FROM transactions_1k
    WHERE
      Price = 634.8 AND Date = '2012-08-25'
  );	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing

28:
SELECT
  T1.Currency,
  SUM(T2.Price) / SUM(T2.Amount)
FROM customers AS T1
INNER JOIN transactions_1k AS T2
  ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID
WHERE
  T1.CustomerID = (
    SELECT
      CustomerID
    FROM transactions_1k
    ORDER BY
      Price * Amount DESC
    LIMIT 1
  );	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
29:
SELECT
  T2.Consumption
FROM Transactions_1K AS T1
JOIN YearMonth AS T2
  ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID
WHERE
  T1.ProductID = 5 AND T1.Price / T1.Amount > 29 AND T2.Date = '201208';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
